message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $95. I believe this price reflects its high value and quality, and I'm confident it will be beneficial for both of us.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to get this product for a bit less. I'm willing to pay $85 for it. Let me know what you think.

I appreciate your interest in our product, Bob. After considering your offer, I'm willing to negotiate further. I would like to offer you the product for $90. This price still allows me to maintain a reasonable profit while providing you with a good deal.
